attributes.review: This is one the worst apps ever I wish that I had never even seen this on the App Store and the on the app is kinda ugly huge turn off

attributes.review: this app is genuinely one of the worst apps i have ever installed on my phone. it keeps crashing, the layout is awful, and the app “contains age restricted material.” why in the hell is an app that supports the president of the united states age restricted? also, let’s not forget trump is a misogynistic, racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic privileged white man. remove this app off the app store immediately.
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review:
Bad bad bad no good 
Apple take this down now,
The app took forever to get my number in,
Then later I got texts from random numbers telling me and threatening me to vote for Trump, 
Then they tried to Dox me .....
attributes.title: DISGUSTING
